::Spears::

She walks out of the CR chamber.  A little heavy sparked, she walks 
down the baddly beaten up halls and to the entrance.  She really 
didn't want to have to assess all the damage to the ship, but she had 
to note it all for her reports.  She hung her head and walked down 
the ramp.  She walked out a bit to get a good view of the ship.  It 
was totalled.  The hull was looking like swiss cheese.  The side 
panels were more or less melted. The ramp was burnt.  The main 
structure of the ship was graoning a bit.  She knew the comp room was 
totalled..again.  She sighed and looked at the once great ship, now 
in total ruin.  She looked down and sighed.  She whispered, "I failed 
to protect your ship Striker, I'm sorry."  She looked up and went 
back into the ship.
